text: These are very diet friendly!  Dr.Oz did a show on weight loss and these noodles were featured.  The only bad thing is the "fishy" smell when you open the package.  Rinse very well; drain; microwave for about 1 to 2 min. then I top with my own pasta sauce.  These are so filling, I can't even eat the whole package at 0 calories.  Enjoy!
